noAccount: Need to connect a plug-in wallet or import an account first.
orderListdesc: Note: The order information is cached locally, switching browsers or devices will not keep displaying the original browser information
files would be stored by more merchants: files would be stored by more merchants with higher tips.
FileCidDesc: Unique identification code of the file
fileSizeDesc: If the size you fill in is smaller than the real file size, the order will fail
fileSizeError: Do not upload files larger than 100MB!
tipDesc: Files would be stored by more merchants with higher tips.
priceDesc: The minimum storage price that needs to be paid for this file.

tips.tip1: Please wait for a while. It takes some time for your file to get replicas in the network.
tips.tip2: Please enable IPFS to use this function.

durationDesc: This order is valid for around 6 months.
noteDesc: Any thing about this file (The note will only be cached in your browser locally).

importResult.error1: You must upload a JSON file.

fetchTips: 1.The Fetch function is provided by Crust Storage Explorer, which is a public service and may cause certain delay or time gap. Results shown on this page doe not necessarily reflect the latest network status.
fetchTips2: 2.There will be soon a new Subscan service going live to enhance Fetch performance.
Gateway_Desc: For users who do NOT have a local IPFS client. After placing an on-chain order in Crust DSM, your file will be uploaded to a public IPFS gateway.
IPFS_Desc: For users who have a local IPFS client. After placing an on-chain order in Crust DSM, Storage Merchant will directly fetch files from your IPFS client.
